verses.verse: And you, son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> take <WH3947> you a sharp <WH2299> knife, <WH2719> take <WH3947> you a barber's <WH1532> razor, <WH8593> and cause it to pass <WH5674> on your head <WH7218> and on your beard: <WH2206> then take <WH3947> you balances <WH3976> to weigh, <WH4948> and divide <WH2505> the hair.

You shall burn <WH1197> with fire <WH217> a third <WH7992> part in the middle <WH8432> of the city, <WH5892> when the days <WH3117> of the siege <WH4692> are fulfilled: <WH4390> and you shall take <WH3947> a third <WH7992> part, and smite <WH5221> about <WH5439> it with a knife: <WH2719> and a third <WH7992> part you shall scatter <WH2219> in the wind; <WH7307> and I will draw <WH7324> out a sword <WH2719> after <WH310> them.
You shall also take <WH3947> thereof a few <WH4592> in number, <WH4557> and bind <WH6887> them in your skirts. <WH3671>

Then take <WH3947> of them again, <WH5750> and cast <WH7993> them into <WH413> the middle <WH8432> of the fire, <WH784> and burn <WH8313> them in the fire; <WH784> for thereof shall a fire <WH784> come <WH3318> forth <WH3318> into <WH413> all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> This <WH2063> is Jerusalem: <WH3389> I have set <WH7760> it in the middle <WH8432> of the nations <WH1471> and countries <WH776> that are round <WH5439> about her.

And she has changed <WH4171> my judgments <WH4941> into wickedness <WH7564> more <WH4481> than <WH4480> the nations, <WH1471> and my statutes <WH2708> more <WH4481> than <WH4480> the countries <WH776> that are round <WH5439> about her: for they have refused <WH3988> my judgments <WH4941> and my statutes, <WH2708> they have not walked <WH1980> in them.

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> you multiplied <WH1995> more <WH4481> than <WH4480> the nations <WH1471> that are round <WH5439> about you, and have not walked <WH1980> in my statutes, <WH2708> neither <WH3808> have kept <WH6213> my judgments, <WH4941> neither <WH3808> have done <WH6213> according to the judgments <WH4941> of the nations <WH1471> that are round <WH5439> about you;

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2005> I, even <WH1571> I, am against <WH5921> you, and will execute <WH6213> judgments <WH4941> in the middle <WH8432> of you in the sight <WH5869> of the nations. <WH1471>

And I will do <WH6213> in you that which <WH834> I have not done, <WH6213> and whereunto <WH834> I will not do <WH6213> any more <WH5750> the like, <WH3644> because <WH3282> of all <WH3605> your abominations. <WH8441>

Therefore <WH3651> the fathers <WH1> shall eat <WH398> the sons <WH1121> in the middle <WH8432> of you, and the sons <WH1121> shall eat <WH398> their fathers; <WH1> and I will execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> in you, and the whole <WH3605> remnant <WH7611> of you will I scatter <WH2219> into all <WH3605> the winds. <WH7307>

Why, <WH3651> as I live, <WH2416> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Surely, <WH518> <WH3808> because <WH3282> you have defiled <WH2930> my sanctuary <WH4720> with all <WH3605> your detestable <WH8251> things, and with all <WH3605> your abominations, <WH8441> therefore will I also <WH1571> diminish <WH1639> you; neither <WH1571> shall my eye <WH5869> spare, <WH2347> neither <WH3808> will I have any pity. <WH2550>

A third <WH7992> part of you shall die <WH4191> with the pestilence, <WH1698> and with famine <WH7458> shall they be consumed <WH3615> in the middle <WH8432> of you: and a third <WH7992> part shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719> round <WH5439> about you; and I will scatter <WH2219> a third <WH7992> part into all <WH3605> the winds, <WH7307> and I will draw <WH7324> out a sword <WH2719> after <WH310> them.

Thus shall my anger <WH639> be accomplished, <WH3615> and I will cause my fury <WH2534> to rest <WH5117> on them, and I will be comforted: <WH5162> and they shall know <WH3045> that I the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it in my zeal, <WH7068> when I have accomplished <WH3615> my fury <WH2534> in them.
Moreover I will make <WH5414> you waste, <WH2723> and a reproach <WH2781> among the nations <WH1471> that are round <WH5439> about you, in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> that pass <WH5674> by.

So it shall be a reproach <WH2781> and a taunt, <WH1422> an instruction <WH4148> and an astonishment <WH8047> to the nations <WH1471> that are round <WH5439> about you, when I shall execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> in you in anger <WH639> and in fury <WH2534> and in furious <WH2534> rebukes. <WH8433> I the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it.

When I shall send <WH7971> on them the evil <WH7451> arrows <WH2671> of famine, <WH7458> which <WH834> shall be for their destruction, <WH4889> and which <WH834> I will send <WH7971> to destroy <WH7843> you: and I will increase <WH3254> the famine <WH7458> on you, and will break <WH7665> your staff <WH4294> of bread: <WH3899>

So will I send <WH7971> on you famine <WH7458> and evil <WH7451> beasts, <WH2416> and they shall bereave <WH7921> you: and pestilence <WH1698> and blood <WH1818> shall pass <WH5674> through you; and I will bring <WH935> the sword <WH2719> on you. I the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it.
